ARABIC: فَلَمَّا دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِ أَبَوَيْهِ وَقَالَ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مِصْرَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then when they entered into Yusuf's presence, he drew his parents close to him and said, 'Enter Egypt safe and sound, if Allah wills.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When they went back to Joseph he gave his father and mother a place of honour, and said: "Enter Egypt in peace by the will of God."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And when they went to Joseph, he took his parents aside and said (to the members of his family): "Enter the city now, and if Allah wills, you shall be secure."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When they all came to Joseph, he welcomed his parents and said, "Enter the town in peace, if God wants it to be so."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when they all reached in Yusuf’s company, he kept his parents close to him, and said, “Enter Egypt, if Allah wills, in safety.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, when they came in before Yusuf, he took his parents to himself and said: "Enter Egypt, if Allah wills, in security."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then when they came in to Yusuf, he took his parents to lodge with him and said: Enter safe into Egypt, if Allah please.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So, when they entered unto Joseph, he took his father and mother into his arms saying, 'Enter you into Egypt, if God will, in security.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when they came in before Joseph, he took his parents unto him, and said: Come into Egypt safe, if Allah will!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then, when they presented themselves before Joseph, he drew his parents to him and said, "Welcome to Egypt, in safety, if God wills!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when they entered unto Yusuf, he betook his parents unto himself. and said: enter Misr, if Allah will, in security.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When they entered into the presence of Joseph, he set his parents close to himself, and said, ‘Welcome to Egypt, in safety, God willing!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then when they entered the presence of Joseph, he provided a home for his parents with himself, and said: "Enter ye Egypt (all) in safety if it please Allah."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, when they entered unto Yusuf (Joseph), he betook his parents to himself and said: "Enter Egypt, if Allah wills, in security."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when they entered before Joseph, he took his father and mother into his arms and said: 'Welcome to Egypt, safe, if Allah wills'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, when they entered into the presence of Joseph, he embraced his parents, and said, “Enter Egypt, God willing, safe and secure.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when they entered upon Joseph, he took his parents to himself and said, "Enter Egypt, Allah willing, safe [and secure]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:99] And when they entered to Joseph, in his tent, he took his parents, his father and his mother — or [and] his maternal aunt — into his arms, and said, to them: ‘Enter into Egypt, if God will, in safety’, and they entered, and Joseph sat down on his throne.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when they came in before Joseph, he took his parents unto him) he joined to him his father and stepmother, for his own mother was dead by then, (and said: Come into) dwell in (Egypt safe) from the enemies and from hunger, (if Allah will!) if Allah wills, you stay in Egypt safe from your enemies and hunger.
